author: Tom Joyner
title: 'Difficult enough without coronavirus': Year 12 students prepare to finish school in isolation
description: Only a few months into what many consider to be the most stressful year of their young lives, Year 12 students nationwide are preparing to complete their secondary studies from home.
content:
Posted 
April 06, 2020 16:28:02
Year 12 students across the country are preparing for what could be months of learning remotely from their homes, with many uncertain if they will be able to return to school for the foreseeable future or even sit their final… [+5335 chars]
